 1:The subject of insectatur is the philosopher.↩
content.question: According to the passage, for which of the following reasons can the reader infer that the philosopher is an excellent teacher?

choices.label: He travels from city to city to meet new people.
He avoids pointing out his students’ mistakes.
He inspires his students to listen to him.
He encourages others to teach as well.

content.answer: He inspires his students to listen to him.
